Package com.dp.spring.parallel.hestia.services

Interface UserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdminUserServiceImpl, CompanyManagerUserServiceImpl, EmployeeUserServiceImpl, HeadquartersReceptionistUserServiceImpl, UserServiceImpl
public interface UserService
Generic User operations.

  • Method Details

    • register

      <U extends User> void register(RegistrationRequestDTO toRegister, RegistrationService<U> registrationService)
      User creation when no resource scope id is defined.
      Read also register(Integer, RegistrationRequestDTO, RegistrationService).
      Type Parameters:
      U - the type of the user to register, related to its role
      Parameters:
      toRegister - the user to register
      registrationService - the strategy to use for registration

    • register

      <U extends User> void register(Integer scopeId, RegistrationRequestDTO toRegister, RegistrationService<U> registrationService)
      User creation according to the RegistrationService implementation passed as a parameter.
      Type Parameters:
      U - the type of the user to register, related to its role
      Parameters:
      scopeId - the id of the resource to attach the user to (e.g. company id, headquarters id, etc.)
      toRegister - the user to register
      registrationService - the strategy to use for registration

    • user

      User user(Integer id)
      Retrieving user by id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the user
      Returns:
      the user

    • whoAmI

      User whoAmI()
      Retrieving the logged in user.
      Returns:
      the principal

    • updatePersonalData

      void updatePersonalData(UpdatePersonalDataRequestDTO updatedData)
      Updating the authenticated user's personal data.
      Parameters:
      updatedData - the updated personal data

    • changePassword

      void changePassword(ChangePasswordRequestDTO changeRequest)
      Changing the authenticated user's password.
      Parameters:
      changeRequest - the request for changing password
